page.title: 08Farming
page.content: We visited two farms in the block one near Wroxeter and the other on Charlton Hill. {MR BEDDOES' FARM, EYTON-ON-SEVERN} The farm has four main products, corn sugar beet, potatoes and sheep. There is 400 acres of ploughing land and 70 acres of grass and buildings. There are only four farm hands who work on the farm so Mr Beddoes has many machines to save labour. There are several tractors, ploughs, a potato harvester, seed drills, a combined harvester , a baler and a corn dryer. {MR DAVIES' FARM, CHARLTON HILL Mr Davies' main product is pigs and there are over 500 of them as well as some sheep and cattle. The main crops are corn and sugar beet which are grown on the 300 acres. Mr Davies only has one farm hand so he also has many machines to help with the work.
